snippet.title: Rise of Legions -  Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Rise of Legions is a castle-siege RTS and releases Feb 22nd!
Get it for FREE on Steam:  
https://store.steampowered.com/app/748940/

Rise of Legions is a free-to-play castle siege RTS set in a rich fantasy world. Collect dozens of powerful units and devastating spells. Play competitive matches and take on fierce bosses in PvE challenges.
